abstract: The beverage company’s sales volume grew by a combined 33 percent in India, China and Brazil, pushing earnings to $2.05 billion in the first quarter.
snippet: The beverage company’s sales volume grew by a combined 33 percent in India, China and Brazil, pushing earnings to $2.05 billion in the first quarter.
lead_paragraph: Sales of the Coca-Cola Company’s myriad beverages grew around the world in the first quarter, led by consumption in India, where volume soared 20 percent.

headline.main: Strong Sales Lift Earnings at Coca-Cola
headline.print_headline: Strong Sales Lift Earnings At Coca-Cola
